>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/payment/payment-slip/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Use this method to update an already issued payment slip by passing it's pactualId.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"pactualId","description":"Unique resource Identifier (Uuid) generated by api.","schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>
